articles.title: Markets Wait for Impact of US Deals With Nvidia, AMD
articles.summary: Will there be a globally dominant artificial intelligence standard, or different forks for the technology’s development? That’s what Lei Qiu, CIO for Thematic Innovation Equities at AllianceBernstein, is watching as the US allows some AI chips to be sold to China. She joins Caroline Hyde and Ed Ludlow on “Bloomberg Tech.” (Source: Bloomberg)

She joins Caroline Hyde and Ed Ludlow on “Bloomberg Tech.” (Source: Bloomberg)

articles.title: Apple's New Plan for Artificial Intelligence
articles.summary: Apple Inc. is planning a comeback in artificial intelligence with new devices, including robots, a smart speaker with a display, and home-security cameras, according to people with knowledge of the matter. Mark Gurman has the exclusive details on Bloomberg Businessweek. (Source: Bloomberg)

articles.title: YouTube to begin testing a new AI-powered age verification system in the U.S.
articles.summary: YouTube will begin testing an age-verification system in the U.S. that relies on artificial intelligence to differentiate between adults and minors.
articles.translated_title: YouTube to begin testing a new AI-powered age verification system in the U.S.
articles.translated_summary: YouTube will begin testing an age-verification system in the U.S. that relies on artificial intelligence to differentiate between adults and minors.

articles.title: AI Pay Gets So Costly That Taser Maker Is Hunting Acquisitions
articles.summary: The war for artificial intelligence talent has gotten so brutal that even a company whose stock has more than tripled over the past two years is struggling to compete.
articles.translated_title: AI Pay Gets So Costly That Taser Maker Is Hunting Acquisitions
articles.translated_summary: The war for artificial intelligence talent has gotten so brutal that even a company whose stock has more than tripled over the past two years is struggling to compete.

articles.title: Runway AI Founder on How Hollywood Studios Are About to Become ‘Radically Different’: Animation Will Go from Weeks to Seconds
articles.summary: The founder of a powerful artificial intelligence system that could be set to replace human workers in the entertainment industry is predicting a "radically different" world for content creation thanks to the introduction of AI tools.

articles.title: YouTube will start using AI to guess your age. If it’s wrong, you’ll have to prove it
articles.summary: YouTube will begin guessing users’ ages using artificial intelligence on Wednesday, as part of an effort to prevent kids from accessing inappropriate content online.

articles.title: Hertz customers can fight AI damage scanners using these apps
articles.summary: Artificial intelligence is transforming how rental car companies including Hertz and Sixt assess vehicle damage.
articles.translated_title: Hertz customers can fight AI damage scanners using these apps
articles.translated_summary: Artificial intelligence is transforming how rental car companies including Hertz and Sixt assess vehicle damage.

articles.title: What happens when chatbots shape your reality? Concerns are growing online
articles.summary: As people turn to chatbots for increasingly important and intimate advice, some interactions playing out in public are causing alarm over just how much artificial intelligence can warp a user’s sense of reality

articles.title: AI helps astronomers make a potentially major find - an exploding star being attacked by a black hole
articles.summary: Artificial intelligence helps astronomers observe what may be the first known case of a star exploding while interacting with a black hole.
articles.translated_title: AI helps astronomers make a potentially major find - an exploding star being attacked by a black hole

articles.title: Fleet-Tracking Startup Motive Said to Pick JPMorgan for US IPO
articles.summary: Motive Technologies Inc., a driver safety and fleet management startup using artificial intelligence technology, has hired banks led by JPMorgan Chase & Co. to push ahead with an initial public offering, according to a person familiar with the matter.
